sentences.en: a natty little briefcase
sentences.cn: 设计精巧的小公文包

sentences.en: But last week someone left a briefcase full of money!
sentences.cn: 但上次有人遗忘了一只装满钱的公文包!

sentences.en: Davis asked, making a playful pretence at seizing Castle's briefcase.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯一边说, 一边开玩笑地假装要抢卡斯尔的公文包.

sentences.en: Dennis peered into the room and saw her take a small red object out of her briefcase and quickly hide it in the bottom drawer of her dresser.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯窥视着房间里的一举一动，只见她从公文包里拿出一个红色的小东西，快速地把它藏在梳妆台最底下的抽屉里。

sentences.en: Every day you arrive in workspace with the same items — a cell phone, briefcase and/or purse, mail, keys, change.
sentences.cn: 每天你都带着同样的东西进入工作区——一只手机、公文包和/或者手提包、邮件、钥匙、零钱。

sentences.en: He carried the fat briefcase in his left hand.
sentences.cn: 他左手提着那只鼓鼓囊囊的皮包.

sentences.en: He packed a briefcase with what might be required.
sentences.cn: 他把所有可能需要的东西都装进公文包.

sentences.en: He popped a letter out of his briefcase.
sentences.cn: 他从公文包里突然掏出一封信。

sentences.en: He put down his briefcase and asked her what was wrong.
sentences.cn: 他放下公文包,问她出了什么事.

sentences.en: He requested the old man to look after the briefcase.
sentences.cn: 他请求那位老人照看这个公事包.

sentences.en: He settled his briefcase comfortably in his lap.
sentences.cn: 他把公文包舒适地搁在大腿上.

sentences.en: He was carrying a briefcase.
sentences.cn: 他提着公文包。

sentences.en: I can't shut my briefcase.
sentences.cn: 我关不上公事包.

sentences.en: I should not leave my briefcase and camera bag unguarded.
sentences.cn: 我不该把我的公文包和相机包留在那儿无人看管。

sentences.en: If you ask about my impression on him, I feel he looks like a typical businessman, you know, dark suit and briefcase.
sentences.cn: 如果你问我对他的印象如何，我感觉他看起来像是个典型的商人，你知道，黑西装和公文包的那种。

sentences.en: No one told me about any briefcase.
sentences.cn: 没有人和我提过什么公文包。

sentences.en: The briefcase flopped onto the desk.
sentences.cn: 公文包重重地落在桌上。

sentences.en: The guard noticed he was still carrying the briefcase.
sentences.cn: 门卫注意到他仍然带着那个公文包.

sentences.en: The young man held a briefcase under his arm.
sentences.cn: 那位年轻人腋下挟着一只公文包.

sentences.en: Then I tackled briefcase I had carried off the train.
sentences.cn: 然后我便摆弄我从火车上带下来的那个皮包.

trans.tran_en: a flat case used especially by business people for carrying papers or documents
